title: What aspects of your daily life have your smartphone made not just easier, but also more convenient? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Being able to Google search something is incredibly helpful. From how to spell something to the definition of a word to digging into a subject and researching. I feel like that’s the all time best aspect of having a “smart” phone rather than just a normal phone.
